rules_text:
When Dokkar Clansman enters, choose one–
• Create two 1/1 white Viking creature tokens.
• Create two Glyph tokens. [i](They’re artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.”)[/i]
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Dokkar Clansman for each creature you control.
